title: Harden Kubernetes cluster security posture
objective: Establish pod security, network policies, and admission controls across the cluster.

title: Enable Kubernetes control plane observability
objective: Capture API audit logs and control plane telemetry for security review.

title: Standardize Kubernetes workload scaling policies
objective: Configure HPA and cluster autoscaling for demand-based capacity management.

title: Establish Kubernetes disaster recovery readiness
objective: Ensure etcd backups and cluster state can be restored within RTO targets.

title: Secure Kubernetes workload network segmentation
objective: Apply namespace isolation and network policies for traffic control.

title: Implement Kubernetes credential rotation workflow
objective: Rotate service account tokens and image pull secrets without service disruption.

title: Enable Kubernetes resource quota governance
objective: Apply namespace quotas and limits to prevent resource exhaustion.

title: Harden Kubernetes pod security standards
objective: Enforce baseline/restricted pod security profiles across namespaces.

title: Establish Kubernetes certificate automation
objective: Automate TLS certificate issuance and renewal for ingress workloads.

title: Configure Kubernetes node maintenance procedures
objective: Enable safe node draining and upgrades without workload disruption.

title: Implement Kubernetes backup for stateful workloads
objective: Schedule and validate persistent volume backup procedures.

title: Establish Kubernetes incident response runbooks
objective: Document and test failover, rollback, and recovery procedures.
